doc.field: "The Irony of Hillary Clinton’s Data Analytics"
"Barack Obama’s campaign adopted data but Hillary Clinton’s campaign has been molded by data from birth."
"Clinton got out data-ed and out organized in 2008 by Obama. She seems at least to learn over time, and apply the lessons learned to the real world."
"No, she lost because (1) she is thoroughly detested person and (2) the DNC decided Obama should therefore win."
